parameters.name: Bypass
parameters.description:
Bypass mode. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: Fallback
parameters.description:
The exception origin switch. After you turn on this switch, if a function exception occurs, such as CPU usage exceeding the upper limit, requests are sent to the origin. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: RouteEnable
parameters.description:
The routing switch. Valid values:

*   on
*   off

parameters.name: Sequence
parameters.description: The order in which the rule is executed.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.
